attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why do we still have "Job Centres" if the only jobs advertised there are with an agency.
In these times of financial stress when many people with low paid jobs are struggling to make ends meet, How can you justify the job agencies being able to take money from peoples wages leaving them with less to live on, this is basicly slave labour.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
